import Mathlib

/-- If the product of a family of nonempty topological spaces is Hausdorff (T2),
then each factor is Hausdorff. -/

  (h_nonempty : ∀ i, Nonempty (X i)) :
  T2Space (∀ i, X i) → ∀ i, T2Space (X i) := by sorry
